00028 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPlayerAdd::CurlPlayerAdd()
00029                                           :CurlSubmitForm(){
00030 
00031   GlobalURI g;
00032 
00033   xml=new xmlPlayerList();
00034   this->filename=g.getAdminAdress("addplayer.php");
00035   // Setting the posted data key values
00036   postedData.addKey("name");
00037   postedData.addKey("pwd");
00038   postedData.addKey("timestamp");
00039   postedData.addKey("mail");
00040 
00041 }

00046 RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPlayerAdd::~CurlPlayerAdd(){
00047   xml->~xmlPlayerList();
00048   xml=NULL;
00049 }

00061 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPlayerAdd::controlBefore(){
00062   bool ret=true;
00063 
00064   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00065   const char* pwd=postedData.getValue("pwd");
00066   const char* mail=postedData.getValue("mail");
00067   const char* errmsg;
00068 
00069   // The password is empty
00070   if (strlen(name)==0){
00071     errmsg="The new player's name is empty";
00072     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00073     LOGW(errmsg);
00074     ret=false;
00075   }
00076 
00077 
00078   // The password is empty
00079   if (strlen(pwd)==0){
00080     errmsg="Cannot add a player with empty password";
00081     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00082     LOGW(errmsg);
00083     ret=false;
00084   }
00085 
00086 
00087 
00088   // The player already exists
00089   if (xml->isPlayerExisting(name)){
00090     errmsg="The player already exists";
00091     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00092     LOGW(errmsg);
00093 
00094     ret=false;
00095 
00096   }
00097 
00098   // The player already exists
00099   if (xml->isMailExisting(mail)){
00100     errmsg="This mail adress is already in use";
00101     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00102     LOGW(errmsg);
00103     ret=false;
00104   }
00105 
00106   //Tests the email adress 
00107 
00108   // The mail is empty
00109   if (strlen(mail)==0){
00110     errmsg="Cannot add a player with empty email adress";
00111     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00112     LOGW(errmsg);
00113     ret=false;
00114   }
00115 
00116 
00117 
00118   // The @ sign
00119   char* atSign=strchr(mail, '@');
00120   if (atSign==NULL){
00121     errmsg="The email adress does not contain the 'at' sign";
00122     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00123     LOGW(errmsg);
00124     ret=false;
00125   }
00126 
00127   // The . sign
00128   char* dotSign=strchr(mail, '.');
00129   if (dotSign==NULL){
00130     errmsg="The email adress does not contain the 'dot' sign";
00131     setCustomErrorMessage(errmsg);
00132     LOGW(errmsg);
00133     ret=false;
00134   }
00135 
00136 
00137   postedData.setTimestamp("timestamp");
00138 
00139   return ret;
00140 }
00141 
00147 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::CurlPlayerAdd::controlAfter(){
00148   xml->refresh();
00149   bool ret=true;
00150  
00151   // Get the values
00152   const char* name=postedData.getValue("name");
00153   const char* pwd=postedData.getValue("pwd");
00154   const char* mail=postedData.getValue("mail");
00155 
00156   tPlayerListItem *it=xml->getPlayer(name);
00157   const char* itname= it->name;
00158   const char* itpwd= it->password;
00159   const char* itmail= it->mail;
00160 
00161   // control Name
00162   if ((strlen(name)==0)||(strlen(itname)==0)){
00163     LOGW("One of the name is empty, controlAfter failed");
00164     ret=false;
00165 
00166   }
00167   else{
00168     if (strcmp(name, itname)==0){
00169       LOGI("The name is the same");
00170     }
00171     else{
00172       LOGW("The name is not the same");
00173       ret=false;
00174     }
00175 
00176   // control Password
00177 
00178     HashPassword hp;
00179     bool retpwd=hp.compare(pwd, itpwd);
00180     if (retpwd){
00181       LOGI("The password is the same");
00182     }
00183     else{
00184       LOGW("The password is not the same");
00185       LOGW(pwd);
00186       LOGW(itpwd);
00187       
00188       ret=false;
00189     }
00190 
00191     // control Mail
00192     if (strcmp(mail, itmail)==0){
00193       LOGI("The mail adress is the same");
00194     }
00195     else{
00196       LOGW("The mail adress is not the same");
00197       ret=false;
00198     }
00199   }
00200 
00201 
00202   return ret;
00203 }
